sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Britannia's pastorals. The first booke Browne, William, 1590-ca. 1645.
[16], 140 [i.e. 142], [14], 179, [1] p. : ill.
Printed by Iohn Hauiland, London : 1625.
Dedication signed: W. Brovvne. In verse. Book 2 has separate dated title page and pagination; register is continuous. P. 142 (first series) misnumbered 140. The title page to Book 2 is conjugate, with "Haviland" in the imprint. Variant 1: title page is a cancel, with "Haviland" in the imprint. Variant 2: title page is conjugate, with misprint "Havilad". Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
=======

[16], 140 [i.e. 142], [14], 179, [1] p. : ill.

Dedication signed: W. Brovvne. In verse. Book 2 has separate dated title page and pagination; register is continuous. P. 142 (first series) misnumbered 140. The title page to Book 2 is conjugate, with "Haviland" in the imprint. Variant 1: title page is a cancel, with "Haviland" in the imprint. Variant 2: title page is conjugate, with misprint "Havilad". Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
Iohn Hauiland
